TextLibrary.Text: Khrona
How did you fare with Gruulkar?
How did you fare with Gruulkar?
How did you fare with Gruulkar?
How did you fare with Gruulkar?
Not well. He refused to listen to me.
Not well. He refused to listen to me.
Not well. He refused to listen to me.
Not well. He refused to listen to me.
That is the way of Orcs.
That is the way of Orcs.
That is the way of Orcs.
That is the way of Orcs.
I need your advice. How else can I stop him?
I need your advice. How else can I stop him?
I need your advice. How else can I stop him?
I need your advice. How else can I stop him?
Short of killing him, I do not believe we CAN stop him. We must prepare for war.
Short of killing him, I do not believe we CAN stop him. We must prepare for war.
Short of killing him, I do not believe we CAN stop him. We must prepare for war.
Short of killing him, I do not believe we CAN stop him. We must prepare for war.
